title: King of Blood
description: The kings and queens of Under have returned…My magic has woken the most dangerous beings in Under’s history. As they take back their thrones, the rivalries between them could drag us all into war.Aon tried to prepare me for this moment, by unleashing the powers inside me and teaching me to fight.But his methods were more vicious than I could ever imagine. The passion between us still burns bright. But I can never forgive the way he sacrificed my friend without hesitation or remorse.Now, as a deadly struggle begins, my relationship with Aon is utterly broken. I stand alone… and unprotected.But I am no longer a helpless mortal, facing down enemies with unimaginable power. I am one of them—the Queen of Dreams.To save my life and heal this world, I must make deadly new allies. But will my bond with Aon—and the love I can no longer deny—turn all of Under against me?I just need to determine whether he’s an ally…or the worst enemy Under has ever seen.
author: Kathryn Ann Kingsley
